alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Ottawa; Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 10:15PM CDT until June 07 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ottawa County in north central Kansas... Southern Republic County in north central Kansas... Northern Clay County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Washington County in north central Kansas... Cloud County in north central Kansas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1015 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Mahaska to 3 miles northeast of Norway to near Randall, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Concordia, Clyde, Clifton, Miltonvale, Glasco, Linn, Delphos, Greenleaf, Jamestown, Morganville, Cuba, Morrowville, Norway, Palmer, Haddam, Agenda, Aurora, Vining and Idana. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
